name: Distrigaz Sud Retele
headAddress: Bd. Marasesti, nr. 4-6, Corp B, Sector 4
membership:
Marcogaz - Technical Association of the European Natural Gas Industry
ACUE - Association of Utility Companies in Romania
goal: Subsidiary of ENGIE Romania, Distrigaz Sud Retele is the first distribution company in Romania, having 30 years of experience in this field. The company operates, maintains and develops the biggest distribution network in Southern Romania (19,000 km, ~60% of the entire distribution network) serving more than 20 partners. Distrigaz Sud Retele also guarantees the quality of the distribution service and ensures the safe operation of the system and installations.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy Union and related policies
EU Transport policies
EU Environment policies
